app.heading: Habit Button
app.description: Track habits with a one-click button and heatmap.
settings.heading: Habit Button
settings.language.label: Interface language
settings.dailyFolder.label: Daily folder
settings.dailyFolder.desc: Folder that contains daily notes to scan for habits.
settings.dailyNoteFormat.label: Daily note format
settings.dailyNoteFormat.desc: Moment.js pattern used for daily note file names.
settings.templatePath.label: Daily note template
settings.templatePath.desc: Optional template used when creating a missing daily note.
settings.border.label: Show card borders
settings.border.desc: Disable to render habit cards and groups without padding/border.
group.emptyEager: No habits found for this group.

settings.dimensions.cellSize.label: Cell size
settings.dimensions.cellGap.label: Cell gap
settings.dimensions.dotSize.label: Dot size
settings.dimensions.dotSize.desc: Pixel size of dots in row layout.
settings.dimensions.dotGap.label: Dot gap
settings.dimensions.dotGap.desc: Space between dots in row layout.
settings.habits.heading: Habits
settings.tagPrefix.label: Tag prefix
settings.gracePeriod.label: Grace period (hours)
settings.gracePeriod.desc: How many hours can pass before the streak breaks (warning window is added on top).
settings.warnWindow.label: Warning window
settings.warnWindow.desc: Hours before the break when the flame indicator appears.
settings.weekStart.label: Week start
settings.weekStart.desc: First day of the week for grid layout.
settings.defaultLayout.label: Default layout
settings.defaultLayout.desc: Heatmap layout to use when none is specified.
settings.gridWeeks.label: Grid weeks
settings.gridWeeks.desc: Number of weeks to show in grid heatmap layout.
settings.rowDays.label: Row days
settings.rowDays.desc: Number of days to show in row heatmap layout.
